categories: Category:Star Wars: Darth Vader and the Cry of Shadows

nodes.text: Darth Vader and the Cry of Shadows 5
Darth Vader and the Cry of Shadows 5 is the fifth and final issue in the Star Wars: Darth Vader and the Cry of Shadows comic mini-series written by Tim Siedell. It was released on April 16, 2014.

Stormtrooper Hock sabotages the remnant Separatists from the inside as they defend against Darth Vader's advancing forces, and fights for his life against a figure from his past. At Vader's side, Hock witnesses firsthand the power and ruthlessness of the man-machine he has followed into battle!
